author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modifies the Starlight gen fragments to run on singularity. Should address the issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49849

#### PR validation:

Tested with workflows 180.1,181.1,182.1,183.1

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to 16_0_X (where the change in singularity was introduced)
title: Fix Starlight relvals
